DataElement.preferredName: Patient Current Therapeutic Procedure Status Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response that indicates whether or not the patient's current treatment status meets the eligibility criteria for participation in a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Current Therapeutic Procedure Status Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Occurring in or belonging to the present time._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._A condition or state at a particular time._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Current Therapeutic Procedure Status Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:A condition or state at a particular time.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
A condition or state at a particular time.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.: To take, accept, or get something offered.: Any intervention for management of a malignant neoplasm.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.
To take, accept, or get something offered.
Any intervention for management of a malignant neoplasm.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.: No longer planned or scheduled (said of events).: To a complete degree or to the full or entire extent.: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
No longer planned or scheduled (said of events).
To a complete degree or to the full or entire extent.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: May be either off all treatme
ReferenceDocuments.description: May be either off all treatment OR actively receiving anticancer therapy in an adjuvant setting, maintenance setting, or for active cancer that is felt to be stable and/or controlled and not rapidly progressive as per treating clinician judgement at the time of screening.

ReferenceDocuments.name: WF-1
ReferenceDocuments.description: May be either off all treatment OR actively receiving anticancer therapy in an adjuvant setting, maintenance setting, or for active cancer.
